page.title: 08THE R.U.C POLICE FORCE
page.content: The number of police serving the community in Castlederg is 40, plus 2 sergents and 1 inspector. The station is manned 24 hours and examples of the type of situation a policeman has to deal with an average week are accidents, family disputes and regular mobile patrols. The manning of the security gate in the centre of the town plays an important role for the policeman. Unfortunately there is little hope of the town being re_opened in the near future. Many Catholics are alienated from the police,particularly the younger generation.
